text.tspan: Numeracy vs. literacy skills of adults, 2015
Shown are the results of OECD's Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC).
PIAAC: Mean Adult Numeracy Proficiency. Total
PIAAC: Mean Adult Literacy Proficiency. Total
Data source: OECD Programme for the International Assessment of Adult Competencies (PIAAC)
